snippet: Sandy Hatfield, the stallion manager at Three Chimneys Farm in Midway, Ky., where I'll Have Another's sire, Flower Alley, stands, shares her hands-on familiarity.
abstract: Sandy Hatfield, the stallion manager at Three Chimneys Farm in Midway, Ky., where I'll Have Another's sire, Flower Alley, stands, shares her hands-on familiarity.

headline.main: I'll Have Another's Sire: Big, Friendly and Newly Popular
